document_data.caption: A map showing the Al-Nuhas River flowing east to Sikak.
document_data.name: Al-Nuhas River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Nuhas River''', also called the '''River of Copper''', was a small river found in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[Zakhara|west Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: Al-Nuhas flowed east from the center of [[Al-Yabki Mountains]] for {{SI|75|mi|k}} before reaching the city of [[Sikak]] on the coast of the [[Golden Gulf]].
